name: Soo Ying Chan Carusone
title: Assistant Clinical Professor (Adjunct), Health Research Methods, Evidence, and Impact
overview: Soo is a mixed methods health researcher by training with extensive experience leading, facilitating and supporting research done through academic-community partnerships and with those with relevant lived experience.
